Battleship

Configuring your fleet

  • Drag a ship and drop it onto your desired position or click random to position your ships randomly
  • Click done once satisfied with the positions of your ships

Game-play

  • Click on a position on your opponents board to shoot it
  • Hit shots are marked with
  • Missed shots are marked with
  • In 2-player mode, players take turns by passing the device back and forth
  • In 2-player mode, click on show board to reveal the positions of your ships but only if it's your turn
